props.name: children
props.description: This will be the Button description.

props.name: variant
props.description: Changes the look and feel of the button which is different for each variant

props.name: size
props.description: Changes the size of the icon button component

props.name: inactive
props.description: Whether the button looks visually disabled, but can still accept all the same interactions as an enabled button.

props.name: icon
props.description: provide an octicon. It will be placed in the center of the button

props.name: aria-label
props.description: Use an aria label to describe the functionality of the button. Please refer to [our guidance on alt text](https://primer.style/guides/accessibility/alternative-text-for-images) for tips on writing good alternative text.
